name: Albedo Supremacy
description:
It is a music game without UI. Music from Genshin Impact Albedo's demo.(MIHOYO please dont sue me)

Press Space to start 按空格键开始

Press QWOP to hit the punchline when note is about to hit. There is no line to tell you when the note hit the line. Player will need to relie on their ears.

按QWOP来削球. 判定线被隐藏了，玩家需要通过内心的节奏来判断音符是否到达判定线
